item.description: 1.63.0 (Unreleased) # Remove migrate borrowck mode Stabilize the bundle native library modifier Stabilize $$ in Rust 1.63.0 Make write/print macros eagerly drop temporaries Stabilize Ipv6Addr::to_ipv4_mapped Stabilize const_intrinsic_copy Stabilize {slice,array}::from_ref Stabilize checked slice->str conversion functions Stabilize box_into_pin Stabilize toowned_clone_into Stabilize Path::try_exists() and improve doc Stabilize scoped threads.

1.64.0 (Unreleased) # Stabilize let_chains in Rust 1.64 Utilize PGO for windows x64 rustc dist builds Implement fmt::Write for OsString allow unions with mutable references and tuples of allowed types Stabilize core::ffi:c_* and rexport in std::ffi Stabilize into_future Document and stabilize process_set_process_group Keep unstable target features for asm feature checking Stabilize core::ffi::CStr, alloc::ffi::CString, and friends Stabilize future_poll_fn
